Version 0.99.7

Thank you for the comments. I have made the required changes as suggested. Here are the comment wise changes made and clarifications.

Please remove vignette build products (Tutorial.pdf) from the git repository, these are rebuilt by R CMD build.

Removed vignette build products from git repository.

(suggest) update installation instructions to reflect Bioconductor best practices.

Updated installation instructions as suggested.

(minor) stop(paste(...)) is usually unnecessary (stop() paste()’s its arguments internally).

Fixed all instances of stop(paste(...)).

melting.R:1016 Use stringsAsFactors = FALSE ?

Added stringsAsFactors = FALSE to the eopts data frame.

melting.R:1038 paste0(eopt$ion_agent, "=", eopt$eval, collapse = ":") ? This is to create the input to be passed on to the java melting program, which requires the following syntax.

ion1_name=x.xxe-xx:ion2_name=x.xxe-xx:agent1_name=x.xxe-xx....

meltingBatch.R:81 highly nested functions are dificult to parse; consider a more straght-forward iterative representation.

Expanded the specified nested function as suggested to multiple steps.

melting.R:1196 error / warning handling seems somewhat ad hoc, would it make sense to use futile.logger, e.g.,

&

usually, tryCatch() is not appropropriate for warnings, because one wishes to continue after a warning; compare

Implemented a custom internal function withWE for better error and warning handling. It is used to capture the errors and/or warning(s) from only the java program in the output returned. All non java errors and warnings will show normal behaviour.

Developed by J. Aravind, G. K. Krishna.

Site built with pkgdown 1.3.0.9000.
